titled: First year of professional license in Software and Database Engineering
location: Ecole national d'informatique de Fianarantsoa - ENI
description: During this year, we were taught the fundamentals of computer science, such as mathematics, algorithms, and programming languages like C, Bash scripting, and JavaScript. At the end of the year, we had to complete a group project to be submitted to the institution in order to advance to the next level.

titled: Second year of professional license in Software and Database Engineering
location: Ecole national d'informatique de Fianarantsoa - ENI
description: The second year built upon the foundation laid in the first year of training. We delved deeper into algorithmics and programming languages such as C++, C#, Java, and PHP, while also beginning to learn about database management systems like MySQL and PostgreSQL. At the end of the year, I completed an internship and carried out a project.

titled: Third year of professional license in Software and Database Engineering
location: Ecole national d'informatique de Fianarantsoa - ENI

description: For two intensive days, I participated in this training organized by ARONE Madagascar and received a certificate for my diligent participation.
